forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low around 55F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High around 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High near 60F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 12C. Winds SW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. A steady rain in the evening, with showers continuing late. Low 54F. Winds SW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain transitioning to a few showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
